input_text.Prompt:
Given a item title and item specifications, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Melrose International Frosted Winterberry Wreath, 26-Inch

Item specifications:
Cedar, with laurel leaves and clumps of white berries with just a light dusting of snow
All stems are wired for easy shaping to full size
Suitable for use inside or outside in a protected area
This wreath adds a touch of warmth to any room or door

Product description:
input_text.Response A: A frosted winterberry wreath is a great way to add a touch of warmth to any room or door during the winter season. This 26-inch wreath is made of cedar, with laurel leaves and clumps of white berries with just a light dusting of snow. All stems are wired for easy shaping to full size. It is suitable for use inside or outside in a protected area.
input_text.Response B: The Melrose International Frosted Winterberry Wreath is a beautiful addition to your holiday decor. It features a lush mix of cedar, laurel leaves, and white berries that are lightly dusted with snow. The wired stems allow for easy shaping, so you can adjust the size of the wreath to fit your needs. This wreath is suitable for use inside or outside in a protected area, so you can add a touch of warmth to any space.
